parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "Dumitru Rujan" as a parliamentary candidate, although not by full name. The image shows him in a campaign-like setting.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed for wide public reach. The message is not a personal communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's primary objective is to encourage voters to support Dumitru Rujan in the upcoming elections. Phrases like "Pe 1 Decembrie, alege-ne" directly advocate for his election.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post touches upon economic policies, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content. It's primarily promotional, focusing on the candidate's promises and achievements.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured political message aimed at influencing voters' choices.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1235337024405561</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Dumitru Rujan, promotes his candidacy for the parliamentary elections.  It directly addresses the public, urging them to vote for him on December 1st. The post highlights his plans to support entrepreneurs and boasts about the government's success in absorbing EU funds. While it mentions economic policies, the overall tone and purpose are clearly electoral, aiming to influence voters' decisions. The image accompanying the post further reinforces this, showing the candidate in a setting that suggests a campaign event.  The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The fact that it was published after the official campaign period ended (assuming the post's end_date reflects this) constitutes a violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Dumitru Rujan</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Dumitru Rujan, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 (conform datei de încheiere a postării din arhiva de reclame), cu scopul de a influența votul alegătorilor în favoarea sa, prin promovarea candidaturii sale la alegerile parlamentare și prin evidențierea unor realizări guvernamentale,  având un efect electoral clar,  încalcând astfel prevederile legale privind perioada de campanie electorală. Postarea, cu ID-ul 1235337024405561, conține mesaje precum "Pe 1 Decembrie, alege-ne",  direcționate către publicul larg,  și a beneficiat de o investiție financiară între 200 și 299 RON, atingând între 15.000 și 20.000 de impresii, cu o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt topliceanuflorin@yahoo.com și +40767242025.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
